CLaSH.Sized.VectorZ.viterate
BlackBox.templateD:
~SYM[0]_viterate : for ~SYM[1] in ~RESULT'high downto 0 generate
begin
  ~SYM[2]_generate : if ~SYM[1] = (~RESULT'high) generate
  begin
    ~RESULT(~SYM[1]) <= ~ARG[2];
  end generate;

  ~SYM[3]_generate : if ~SYM[1] /= (~RESULT'high) generate
  begin
    ~INST 0
      ~OUTPUT <= ~RESULT(~SYM[1])~
      ~INPUT  <= ~RESULT(~SYM[1]+1)~
    ~INST
  end generate;
end generate;
